product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 67 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner has a soft and feminine theme with a modern promotional layout. The background uses concentric pastel-toned rectangles and curved line accents, overlaid with large translucent pink circles for a decorative touch. The heading layers (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) present the product name using bold serif and sans-serif fonts in a deep rose color, drawing attention at the top left. The `description` layer lists product features in a neat bullet point list, using a slim light font. The `price` layer is placed above a soft pink circle for contrast, and a rectangular `cta_button` with white "SHOP NOW" text (`cta`) reinforces the promotional call. The earring product image (`product_image`) is centered along the bottom half, subtly overlapping background elements for depth and focus.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Rose: `#FCF0F0`
- Warm Pink: `#F5D6D6`
- Soft Coral: `#F8C8C8`, `#F4B9B9`, `#F5BABA`
- Accent Rose: `#A83E51`, `#C15267`
- Text Dark Brown: `#703040`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of earrings with an elegant, feminine color palette primarily featuring soft rose gold (#FAD4D4), blush pink (#F8B8B8), and shimmering crystal white (#FFFFFF) tones. The rose gold metal forms the base structure, harmoniously blending into the blush pink petal design, adding a warm and luxurious feel. The white crystals are strategically placed to highlight the intricate design, creating brilliance and contrast. The color integration is smooth yet distinct, elevated by the reflective crystal textures. For an ad banner, use a light blush background with accents in rose gold and crisp white to reflect grace and finesse.
